할 수 있을 때마다 옳은 일을
하려고 시도해야 하지 않겠어?

Subtitle: Why? It's so much harder to live like that.
Translation:
왜? 그렇게 사는 건
더 힘들 뿐이야

Subtitle: And it's not like someone's keeping score.
Translation:
그리고 누가 점수를
매기는 것 같지도 않잖아

Subtitle: Look, I know you're gonna break up with me, okay?
Translation:
네가 지금 나하고
헤어지려 하는 거 알아

Subtitle: I'm not an idiot. I read your emails to your dad.
Translation:
난 바보가 아니야
네 아빠한테 보낸 메일을 읽었어

Subtitle: Have fun being so amazing and perfect until you die.
Translation:
죽을 때까지 그렇게 멋지고
완벽한 삶을 즐겨보라고

Subtitle: And by the way, I'm talking really fast because I still go to Andy's Coffee,
Translation:
그런데 난 아직 앤디의 카페를 가
그래서 이렇게 빨리 말하고 있지

Subtitle: and I got a full punch card, bro.
Translation:
그런데 난 아직 앤디의 카페를 가
그래서 이렇게 빨리 말하고 있지 그리고 쿠폰도 다 찍었어, 자식아

Subtitle: Good people make me insecure.
When I'm around someone who I think is better than me,
Translation:
저보다 나아 보이는 사람들과
함께 있을 때면

Subtitle: I try and drag them down to my level.
Translation:
전 그 사람들을 제 수준으로
끌어내리려고 노력하죠

Subtitle: That's why perfect Tahani is like my kryptonite.
Translation:
그래서 완벽한 타하니가
저한테 약점인 이유예요

Subtitle: Well, even admitting that is an important step.
And also, maybe don't listen to me. I would love not to listen to you. Wait, what?
Translation:
- 그리고 제 말 듣지 않아도 돼요
- 당신 말을 듣지 않으면 좋겠네요

Subtitle: Basically, my life's work is 3,600 pages of garbage.
Translation:
잠깐, 뭐라고요? 그러니까, 제 인생의 업적은
3,600페이지의 쓰레기예요

Subtitle: Even Michael couldn't understand it. So?
-What does Michael know? -Everything.
That's my point, he knows everything, and it was too convoluted, even for him.
Translation:
바로 그거죠, 그는 모든 걸 아는데
그에게조차 그게 너무 난해했어요

Subtitle: Michael does not know everything.
Translation:
마이클은 모든 걸 다
알지는 못해요

Subtitle: Michael does not know I'm not supposed to be here.
Translation:
마이클은 제가 여기 있으면
안 된다는 걸 몰라요

Subtitle: You wrote 4,000 pages on one of the most complicated subjects in the world.
Translation:
당신은 세계에서 가장 복잡한
주제 중 하나로 4천 페이질 썼죠

Subtitle: I mean, I used to get bored halfway through writing a text message.
Translation:
전 문자 메시지 쓸 때도
반만 쓰면 지겨워지곤 했어요

Subtitle: Be proud.
[Chidi] I want to broaden my horizons and try new things, and I will.
Translation:
저는 제 한계를 넓히고 새로운
시도를 하고 싶어요, 그럴 거예요

Subtitle: But even though I might have gotten lost in the weeds,
Translation:
하지만 제가 잡초 속에서
길을 잃었다고 할지라도

Subtitle: I loved writing this book. And I want to try again.
Translation: 저는 이 책 쓰는 걸 좋아해요 다시 한번 시도하고 싶어요

Subtitle: So, will you be my advisor?
Chidi, all I want is for you to be happy.
Translation:
치디, 제가 원하는 건 오직
당신이 행복한 것뿐이에요

Subtitle: So if spending eternity getting blunt feedback
Translation:
그럼 당신의 두서없고
장황한 생각에 대해서

Subtitle: on your circular, rambling ideas will make you happy,
Translation:
직설적인 조언을 받으면서
평생을 보내도 좋다면

Subtitle: then of course I will be your advisor.
Let's throw that monstrosity in the trash and start over.
Translation:
이 흉물 덩어리를 쓰레기통에
던져버리고 다시 시작합시다

Subtitle: Aren't there maybe some parts worth salvaging?
Translation:
조금이라도 살릴 가치가
있는 부분은 없나요?

Subtitle: Honestly, man, I don't even know. I mean, that thing is unreadable.
Translation: 솔직히, 저도 잘 모르겠어요 내 말은, 저건 읽을 수가 없어요

Subtitle: I literally learned what headaches were because that thing gave me a headache.
Translation:
말 그대로 두통이 뭔지 알게 됐죠
저게 저한테 두통을 줬기 때문이죠

Subtitle: [clicks tongue] Okay.
There you go. New beginnings! Well done.
Oh, hello, Eleanor. Hi.
Sorry, I was just cleaning up.
Are you okay?
Do you want to talk about it?
Desperately.
It's Jianyu.
I just can't seem to connect with him.
Translation:
지안유와 교감할 수
없는 거 같아요

Subtitle: I know that he took a vow of silence,
Translation: 그가 침묵 서약을 한 건 알아요

Subtitle: but he won't even talk to me, his soul mate!
Translation:
하지만 저한테 말도 하지 않아요
소울메이트인데도요!

Subtitle: -And I adore talking. -I know. You do.
Translation: 그리고 전 말하는 걸 좋아해요 알아요, 그렇죠

Subtitle: Eleanor, you don't know what it's like to be in paradise
Translation:
엘리너, 당신은 모를 거예요
낙원에 왔는데도

Subtitle: and feel like there's something just not quite right.
Well...
I may not know exactly what you're feeling,
Translation:
당신이 느끼는 게 뭔지
정확히 알 순 없지만

Subtitle: but I do understand.
And you deserve to be happy, because...
Translation:
그리고 당신은 행복할 자격이
있어요, 왜냐하면...

Subtitle: You are an impressive, thoughtful, and special person.
Translation:
당신은 감동적이고 사려 깊고
특별한 사람이에요

Subtitle: Not to mention...
You have a rockin' bod.
I mean, Jianyu may be mute, but he's not blind.
Translation:
내 말은 지안유가 말은 없을지
모르지만, 눈은 멀지 않았잖아요

Subtitle: -[laughs] -You two belong here. And you belong together.
Translation:
당신 둘은 여기 속해요
그리고 함께 속하죠

Subtitle: And you have all of eternity,
Translation:
그리고 당신에겐 영원이 있어요
그래서 시간은 많이 있죠

Subtitle: so there's plenty of time for things to change.
Translation:
그리고 당신에겐 영원이 있어요
그래서 시간은 많이 있죠 상황이 바뀔 때까지 말이죠

Subtitle: Oh, thank you.
I really needed to hear that. Come here.
Translation:
정말 그 말이 필요했어요
이리 와요

Subtitle: Ugh, of course your hugs are amazing.
Stupid ledge. No stairs.
Everyone here is really into hugging.
Translation:
여기는 모두 정말로
포옹하는 걸 좋아하네요

Subtitle: Looks like someone learned something.
Well, it's 'cause someone else is a really good teacher.
Translation:
이건 누군가가 정말 좋은
선생님이기 때문이에요

Subtitle: Eleanor, hello. How are you, my dear, sweet bestie?
Translation:
엘리너, 안녕하세요 오늘은 기분 어때요
내 사랑스러운 절친?

Subtitle: -[chuckles] -Never better. What's up?
Well, Janet has been acting as my assistant.
It's not what she was designed to do.
Translation:
비서가 되기 위해 만들어진 게
아닌데도 말이에요

Subtitle: -Didn't go great. -But now I'm back to normal.
Translation:
상태가 좋지 않았어요 하지만 이제 다시
정상으로 돌아왔어요

Subtitle: It turns out that the best Janet
was the Janet that was inside Janet all along.
She was feeling a little lost, so I gave her
Translation:
재닛이 조금 방황했었어요
그래서 제가 재닛에게

Subtitle: a self-help book to restore her confidence.
Translation:
재닛이 조금 방황했었어요
그래서 제가 재닛에게 자신감을 회복시켜주려고
자립 안내서를 줬죠

Subtitle: Now I'm living my truth and creating my bliss.
Translation:
이제 저는 진실된 모습으로
제 행복을 만들며 살고 있어요

Subtitle: Anyway, um, look, Michael asked me if I would serve as his assistant,
Translation:
어쨌든, 여기요 마이클이 나한테 비서를
하지 않겠냐고 제안하셨어요

Subtitle: but I'd quite like to focus on my relationship with Jianyu.
Translation:
하지만 난 지안유와의 관계에
조금 더 집중하고 싶어서

Subtitle: So I recommended you for the job. [giggles]
Eleanor, you and I could work side-by-side to figure out
Translation:
엘리너, 저와 같이 이 지역에
뭐가 잘못된 건지

Subtitle: what's going wrong with this neighborhood.
Will you help me?
-How could I say no? -Yeah, hurrah!
-Hurrah! -[laughs]
What now?
Relax, Eleanor.
[nervous chuckle] You sent this to yourself.
Translation: 긴장하지 마, 엘리너 내가 나한테 이걸 보낸 거야

Subtitle: This is your own guilt manifesting itself.
Translation:
이건 내 자신의 죄책감이
자기를 나타내는 거야

Subtitle: I've been waiting for you.
Jianyu? You talk now?
You sent me these threatening notes? What the fork, man?
Translation:
당신이 이 협박 쪽지를
보냈어요? 도대체 뭐죠?

Subtitle: Some Buddhist monk you are.
You don't belong here. Admit it.
Okay, you're right. I don't belong here.
Translation:
좋아요, 당신이 맞아요
전 여기 속하지 않아요

Subtitle: Michael made a mistake. But I'm trying, dude.
Translation:
마이클이 실수를 했어요
하지만 전 노력하고 있어요

Subtitle: I'm really trying to be a good person.
Translation:
마이클이 실수를 했어요
하지만 전 노력하고 있어요 좋은 사람이 되려고 노력 중이에요
난 점점 좋아지고 있는 것 같아요

Subtitle: And I think I'm changing for the better, so just please, please don't rat me out.
Translation:
좋은 사람이 되려고 노력 중이에요
난 점점 좋아지고 있는 것 같아요 그러니 제발 밀고하진 말아줘요

Subtitle: -Don't worry, I won't. -[sighs]
Because I'm not supposed to be here, either.
Translation:
왜냐하면 저도 여기 있으면
안 되거든요

Subtitle: I don't know how I got here, I have no idea what's going on,
Translation:
제가 어떻게 여기로 온 건지
대체 어떻게 된 건지 모르겠어요

Subtitle: and I am freakin' out, homie!
You got to help me. I'm scared!
Translation: 당신이 절 도와줘야 해요 난 무서워요!

Subtitle: What?
Hang on, hang on... You're not supposed to be here either?
Translation:
잠깐만요...
당신도 여기 있으면 안 된다고요?

Subtitle: You're a mistake, just like me?
Yeah, and I'm freaking out, dog.
There's so much thoughts in my brain, it's like my head is filled with rocks.
Translation:
머릿속이 정말 복잡해요
머리가 돌로 꽉 찬 것 같아요

Subtitle: How have you managed to stay undiscovered? Because I have had to dodge and weave
Translation:
어떻게 정체를 감추고 있었어요? 왜냐하면, 저는 요리조리
피해 다녀야 했거든요

Subtitle: and barely escape with my life, and you don't seem...
Translation:
왜냐하면, 저는 요리조리
피해 다녀야 했거든요 진짜 아슬아슬하게요
그런데 당신은...

Subtitle: Like a super genius.
Hello, Jianyu. I'm Michael.
Before we start, I know you were a Buddhist monk
Translation:
시작하기 전에
전 당신이 불교 수도승이었고

Subtitle: and kept a vow of silence.
Would you prefer to remain silent here as well?
You literally haven't said a word since we got here?
Translation:
여기 온 이후로 정말
한마디도 말을 안 했다고요?

Subtitle: Yeah. When I say I'm meditating,
I'm just trying to figure out what the fork is happening.
Translation:
대체 무슨 일이 일어나는지
알아내려 했어요

Subtitle: I think we might be in an alien zoo or on a prank show.
Translation:
외계인 동물원에 들어왔거나
몰래카메라 같은 거로 생각해요

Subtitle: No, Jianyu, we're dead.
Oh, that's a dope prank. [exhales] Got to give it up.
Okay, I need to make sure that this isn't some sort of weird trap.
Translation:
좋아요, 이건 이상한 함정
같은 게 아니에요

Subtitle: Is your real name Jianyu? No. It's Jason Mendoza.
Translation:
- 진짜 이름이 지안유예요?
- 아뇨, 제이슨 멘도사예요

Subtitle: And by the way, everyone here thinks I'm Taiwanese.
Translation:
그나저나 여기 사람들은 제가
타이완 사람이라고 생각해요

Subtitle: I'm Filipino. That's racist. Heaven is so racist.
Translation:
전 필리핀 사람이에요
인종차별이라고요, 특히 천국은

Subtitle: But Tahani said that you helped Michael by putting your hand on his chest
Translation:
타하니 말로는 당신이 손을
마이클 가슴에 대고

Subtitle: and doing some sort of healing magic.
Translation:
무슨 치료 마술 같은 걸 해서
도와줬다고 하던데요

Subtitle: Yeah. A nurse did that to calm me down once
Translation:
예, 제 제트스키가 바다소에
부딪혔을 때 어떤 간호사가

Subtitle: when I crashed my Jet Ski into a manatee.
You crashed your Jet Ski into a manatee?
Yeah. I'm from Jacksonville, Florida. It happens a lot.
Translation:
네, 전 플로리다 주의 잭슨빌
출신이라 그런 일이 많아요

Subtitle: What did you do for a living?
I was an amateur DJ specializing in EDM.
Electronic dance music.
I was also an amateur hip-hop backup dancer,
an amateur body spray inventor...
Um, I did pranks on Vine. None of those are jobs.
Translation:
- 바인에 장난도 쳐봤고요
- 그것들은 다 직업이 아니에요

Subtitle: What did you do to make money?
Oh, I sold fake drugs to college kids.
Okay, good.
Okay, here's my biggest question,
how did you know that I didn't belong here?
Translation:
어떻게 제가 여기 속할 수
없다는 걸 알았어요?

Subtitle: I figured it out the very first night, at the party,
using my powers of deduction.
I heard you don't talk.
Well, here's something for you to not talk about.
Translation:
말하면 안 되는 걸
얘기해 줄게요

Subtitle: I don't belong here. [chuckles]
They made a mistake. Total phony. So... [shushing]
Translation:
그들이 실수한 거예요
완전 가짜라고요, 그럼...

Subtitle: Okay, later, man.
Okay. I vaguely remember that.
I believe you, Jason. You're not supposed to be here.
Translation: 당신을 믿어요, 제이슨 여기 있으면 안 될 사람이에요

Subtitle: Welcome to the bottom of the barrel.
Hello, Tahani.
Oh, hello, Michael.
I was just picking out some fresh orchids for my nightly orchid bath.
Translation:
매일 하는 난초 목욕에 쓸 신선한
난초를 고르고 있었어요

Subtitle: So, Tahani, one of your fellow residents is opening a new restaurant tonight.
Translation:
타하니, 이웃 중 하나가
오늘 밤에 식당을 연다고 해요

Subtitle: This neighborhood could use a real morale boost.
Translation:
이웃 사람들의 사기를
올려 줄 기회예요

Subtitle: And since you're an expert at event planning,
I was hoping that you would help with the grand opening.
Oh, Michael, say no more.
I wasn't going to. I was done.
Well, good, because, of course, I will. Janet?
Translation:
좋아요, 전 당연히 할 거거든요
재닛?

Subtitle: -Hey, there. -Oh, hello, darling.
I would like to model tonight's event on my most successful gala.
Translation:
최고로 성공적이었던 행사를 본떠
오늘 밤 이벤트를 준비하고 싶어요

Subtitle: That would be 2006 fundraiser for stem cell research in Barcelona.
"Barcelona," actually.
Oh, it was a perfect evening.
Princess Stephanie was there, as were Posh and Becks.
Translation:
스테파니 공주가 있었고
데이비드 베컴 부부도 있었죠

Subtitle: You know, International Sophisticate Magazine
gave us five Gwyneths.
Tonight, I'm going to select my jauntiest suit,
Translation:
오늘 밤에 제일 멋진
양복을 입어야겠어요

Subtitle: and I may even wear suspenders.
It's one of the human clothing items I'm most eager to try.
Translation:
제가 제일 입어보고 싶은
인간 의상 중 하나예요

Subtitle: Oh, well, good luck.
Thank you. Yes, yes. I'm excited.
And a little nervous.
I'd say that I'm cautiously optimistic.
Translation:
저는 조심스럽게 낙관적이라고
말할 수 있어요

Subtitle: [laughs] I hope I don't chicken out at the last second.
Translation:
제가 막판에 겁먹고
내빼지 않길 바라요

Subtitle: Sorry... We are talking about suspenders, right?
Translation:
죄송한데, 멜빵 바지에 대해
말하고 있는 것 맞지요?

Subtitle: Like... These?
You can do that with... Oh! I cannot wait.
Translation: 그걸로 그렇게 할 수... 오! 기대되네요

Subtitle: Excellent.
[Eleanor] So, Tahani has no idea about me?
No. She thinks I'm a monk, and she thinks you're her best friend.
Translation:
그래요, 절 수도승이라 생각하고
당신은 절친이라 생각해요

Subtitle: Great. I mean, for us. It's a huge bummer for her.
Translation: 좋아요, 제 말은, 우릴 위해서요 타하니가 크게 실망할 거예요

Subtitle: We need someplace that we can talk in private.
Translation:
우리끼리 조용히 얘기할 수 있는
장소가 필요해요

Subtitle: I agree.
Let me show you my bud-hole.
What?
I should warn you, it's a little messy.
This is my bud-hole.
It's just, like, a hole where me and my buds can hang out.
Translation:
저랑 친구들이 같이 놀 수 있는
구멍 같은 곳이에요

Subtitle: Oh, bud-hole! Okay, now I get it.
I wrote down on a piece of paper that I needed a private meditation area.
Translation:
사적인 명상 공간이 필요하다고
종이에 써놨어요

Subtitle: Tahani will never come in.
Pretty unique decorating style you have here, Jianyu.
It's like, "12-year-old boy" meets "13-year-old boy."
Thanks. Janet helped me get all this stuff.
Translation:
고마워요, 재닛이 이 모든 걸
얻는 걸 도와줬어요

Subtitle: She rules.
Is she single, or is she married to Michael?
No, no, dude, you cannot date Janet.
Translation:
아니요, 이봐요
재닛과 데이트할 수 없어요

Subtitle: A, she's not human. And B, you have to keep
Translation:
첫째, 그녀는 인간이 아니고
둘째, 당신은 계속해서 타하니의

Subtitle: pretending to be Tahani's soul-mate.
Oh, yeah. Yeah, yeah, yeah. Cool.
Okay, just sit tight, dude. I have a class to get to.
Translation:
좋아요, 여기 있어요
전 들어야 할 수업이 있어요

Subtitle: What... A class?
I didn't know there were classes.
Chidi is trying to teach me to be a good person.
Translation:
치디가 저에게 좋은 사람이 되는
법을 가르쳐 주고 있어요

Subtitle: And it's really hard.
Also, Michael has asked me to be his assistant, whatever that means.
Translation:
마이클은 조수가 되어달라는데
무슨 뜻인지 모르겠어요

Subtitle: My whole situation here is getting more and more dicey,
Translation:
여기서의 제 상황은
갈수록 위험해지고 있어요

Subtitle: so I'm actually really glad to have a place I can come
Translation:
그래서 진정한 내가
되고 싶을 때 올 곳이 생겨서

Subtitle: when I just want to be myself.
Yeah. I miss being myself.
Myself was the best.
What's up, man? You're Jason?
You got two minutes. Fred Durst is throwing an orgy
Translation:
2분 주지, 프레드 더스트가
반쯤 뒤집힌 배 위에서

Subtitle: on a partially capsized yacht.
My dad just texted. It already started.
Translation:
방금 아빠 문자로는
시작했다니까, 요점만 말할게

Subtitle: So I'll get right to the point. I listened to your demo.
Translation:
방금 아빠 문자로는
시작했다니까, 요점만 말할게 네 견본 들어봤어, 끔찍해

Subtitle: You're terrible.
-Really? -Yeah.
Okay? You just don't have any... What's the word?
Translation:
알겠어? 넌 그게 없다고
그 단어가 뭐지?

Subtitle: Talent.
But don't worry.
Translation:
하지만 걱정 마
재능보다 더 좋은 게 있잖아

Subtitle: You got something better than talent, man. You got my approximate size and weight.
Translation:
하지만 걱정 마
재능보다 더 좋은 게 있잖아 나하고 키랑 몸무게가 비슷해

Subtitle: I'm supposed to play this club for the rest of the week,
Translation:
이번 주까지 이 클럽에서
공연하게 되어 있는데

Subtitle: but I just got an offer to DJ Scott Disick's after party
Translation:
리노에서 열리는
DJ 스콧 디식이 하는

Subtitle: for the Amateur Porn Awards in Reno.
Translation:
아마추어 포르노 시상식
뒤풀이에 초대를 받았거든

Subtitle: Whoa, congrats, bro. That's the dream.
It's your dream, man. It's my Tuesday.
Translation:
네 꿈이겠지, 친구
내겐 보통 일이야

Subtitle: I just need somebody to fill in.
Put on the helmet. Press spacebar on the computer.
Translation:
헬멧 쓰고 컴퓨터의
스페이스 키나 눌러

Subtitle: Those idiots won't know the difference.
For the next week, Jason, you are Acidcat.
Translation:
다음 주에는 말이야, 제이슨
네가 애시드캣이야

Subtitle: Whoa. There's a lot of old gum in here.
Tahani, how are things going in the front of the house?
Translation:
타하니, 건물 앞쪽은 어떻게
진행되고 있죠?

Subtitle: Because, to be perfectly frank,
things in the kitchen are going great, okay?
Translation:
주방 쪽 일은 훌륭하게
되고 있거든요

Subtitle: I am right on schedule.
Chef Patricia, I have triple-checked every single detail.
Translation:
퍼트리샤 셰프님, 모든
세부 사항을 세 번씩 확인했어요

Subtitle: Your restaurant opening is going to be the talk of the entire neighborhood.
Translation:
식당 개업식은 이웃들
전체의 화제가 될 거예요

Subtitle: Thank you for your thoughtfulness and hard work.
Translation:
신경 써서 열심히
해 주셔서 감사해요

Subtitle: I could not have done this without you.
[Michael] Ah, hello, Tahani.
Sorry. I should've warned you.
Patricia is actually very happy, but she's also very intense.
Translation:
퍼트리샤는 사실 정말 행복한데
긴장도 많이 했어요

Subtitle: It can be confusing.
No, no, no, that's not what's bothering me.
Translation:
아니에요, 그것 때문에
신경 쓰이지는 않아요

Subtitle: It's just that, well,
I looked at the guest list earlier, and Jianyu isn't invited.
Translation:
손님 명단을 봤는데, 지안유가
초대받지 못했더군요

Subtitle: Right.
Jianyu is a beautiful spirit, but he literally doesn't talk,
Translation:
지안유는 아름다운 영혼이지만
전혀 말을 하지 않잖아요

Subtitle: and since this will be an evening of lively conversation,
Translation:
이 행사는 활발한
대화의 장이 될 것이고

Subtitle: and you'll be busy working,
I didn't want him to feel uncomfortable.
I totally understand.
Well reasoned, Michael.
As us Brits are fond of saying, "Try your best to hide your sadness."
Translation:
우리 영국인들이 말하길
'최선을 다해 슬픔을 감춰라'

Subtitle: So, the concept of the self is a key subject
for a lot of great thinkers.
In the Tao Te Ching, Lao Tzu wrote,
"Knowing others is wisdom,
but knowing the self is enlightenment."
Ah... "Knowing" yourself.
Is he talking about what I think he's talking about?
Translation:
그가 말하는 게 제가
생각하는 그 뜻인가요?

Subtitle: No, Eleanor. Once again, none of these philosophers
Translation:
아니요, 엘리너, 다시 말하지만
이 철학자 중 아무도

Subtitle: is ever talking about masturbation.
Let's move on to this week's main event,
Translation:
이번 주의 가장 중요한
주제를 다뤄 보지요

Subtitle: David Hume's A Treatise of Human Nature.
You read this, right?
I did. Well, I tried to. Well, I tried to want to.
Translation:
- 이거 읽어 봤어요?
- 읽었죠 음, 읽으려 했어요
음, 읽기를 원하려 했죠

Subtitle: Mm, actually, could we postpone this lesson?
I've befriended Jianyu from next door, and I thought I could learn from him.
Translation:
옆집의 지안유랑 친구가 되었어요
그에게 배울 게 있을 것 같아요

Subtitle: That's a great idea. Hume's "bundle theory" of the self
Translation:
좋은 생각이에요, 자아에 대한
흄의 '다발 이론'은

Subtitle: is fairly close to Buddhism.
Yeah. No durr. That's why I'm doing it.
Translation:
맞아요, 바로 그거예요
그래서 제가 하려는 거예요

Subtitle: Do you hear music?
That's not music.
That's EDM.
What are you doing?
Eleanor, you were right.
No more pretending. It's time for me to be myself.
Translation:
더는 가식적인 척 안 할래요
나 자신으로 돌아갈 때가 됐어요

Subtitle: What's up, homie?
Eleanor?
You broke Jianyu.
Okay, did we miss anything? Oh! Take that jersey off, you goofball.
Translation:
좋아요, 뭐 빠뜨린 거 있어요?
그 저지 좀 벗어요, 멍청이 양반

Subtitle: Okay. This is not my fault. I swear.
Eleanor, one hour ago, that man was a silent Buddhist monk.
Translation:
엘리너, 한 시간 전에
저 사람은 조용한 불교 승려였어요

Subtitle: Right. But here's the thing, Jianyu is actually...
Translation:
맞아요, 하지만 어떻게 된 거냐면
지안유는 사실...

Subtitle: A guy who is nice.
Hi, Tahani.
Eleanor, Chidi, What a lovely surprise.
Don't mind me. I'm just dropping off my afternoon gloves,
Translation:
신경 쓰지 마세요
그냥 오후 장갑을 벗어 놓고

Subtitle: and picking up my early evening gloves.
-How are you, soul-mate? -I'm cool.
I'm sorry.
Am I going mad, or did I just hear you say, "I'm cool"?
Translation:
내가 미친 건가요, 방금 당신이
'난 좋아요'라고 한 것 같은데?

Subtitle: I don't think so. I don't think that happened.
No, you're wrong.
I see what's going on here.
You've got a whisper in your snicker box.
You're both helping Jianyu to regain his confidence
Translation:
당신 둘 다 지안유가
자신감을 되찾아서

Subtitle: to be able to speak again as a surprise for me!
Translation:
다시 말할 수 있게 돕고 있었군요
날 놀라게 하려고요!

Subtitle: Oh, busted.
[laughing] My heart is soaring.
[Michael] So, Jianyu is talking? -Oh, how wonderful! -[laughs]
I will do everything in my power to encourage him.
Translation:
그를 북돋아 줄 수 있는 건
뭐든 할게요

Subtitle: Well, not everything. I won't give him a second mouth.
Translation:
음, 다 할 수 있는 건 아니네요
두 번째 입을 줄 수는 없으니

Subtitle: Unless that would be helpful. No. Better not risk it.
Translation:
도움이 된다면 모르지만, 아니에요
그런 모험을 하진 맙시다

Subtitle: I've actually had a better idea.
Oh. Let's add Jianyu to the guest list.
Chidi and Eleanor have been working with him,
-and they're going to be here. -What a great idea. Patricia!
Translation:
- 그들도 여기 올 테니까요
- 훌륭한 생각이에요. 퍼트리샤!

Subtitle: We can fit another chair, right?
Change the floor plan an hour before opening?
Translation:
개업식 한 시간 전에
배치를 바꾼다고요?

Subtitle: Of course! The more the merrier!
Oh, hurrah! [laughs]
I knew tonight was going to be perfect, but now it's going to be even perfect-er.
Translation: 오늘 밤이 완벽할 줄 알았지만 이제 더욱 완벽해질 거예요

Subtitle: Obviously, it's impossible for something to be more perfect than perfect...
Translation: 당연히, 완벽한 것보다 더 완벽하다는 건 불가능하지만요

Subtitle: Well, it isn't, actually.
Any place or thing in the universe
can be up to 104% perfect.
That's how you got Beyonce.
Oh... Bud-hole.
Okay... Now, tell me everything.
Translation: 오, 친구-홀, 좋아요 자, 모든 걸 말해 봐요

Subtitle: [Eleanor] Okay, Jianyu...
Is a fraud, just like me.
His real name is Jason.
He's a drug-dealing DJ from Florida.
It's gonna be fine. We just need a plan.
Translation:
괜찮을 거예요
단지 계획만 있으면 돼요

Subtitle: Oh, I got a plan.
We hack into Michael's phone, download all his nudes,
Translation:
마이클 전화기를 해킹해서
그의 나체 사진을 전부 받아서

Subtitle: and then blackmail him.
No. What are you... No.
Translation: 안 돼요, 대체 무슨... 안 돼요

Subtitle: Yo, you should listen to me.
I came up with hundreds of plans in my life,
Translation:
제 평생 수백 개의
계획을 세웠었는데

Subtitle: and only one of them got me killed.
Translation:
그중에 딱 하나가 잘못돼서
죽은 거예요

Subtitle: [Eleanor] Dude, be quiet.
You are not Jason. You are a monk named Jianyu.
Translation:
당신은 제이슨이 아니에요
당신은 지안유라는 수도승이라고요

Subtitle: Got it?
Oh, another great set, Jason. They love you, dude.
They don't love me, man. They love Acidcat.
Translation:
날 좋아하는 게 아니야
애시드캣을 좋아하는 거지

Subtitle: These cheers are fake.
They hit my ears like boxing gloves of sadness.
Translation:
내 귀를 슬픔으로 가득 찬
권투 글러브로 치는 것 같다고

Subtitle: Oh, that's some poetic thoughts, B.
I got to be myself.
Attention, Jacksonville. I'm not Acidcat.
Translation:
주목해 주세요, 잭슨빌
전 애시드캣이 아닙니다

Subtitle: I'm Mr. Music, the DJ.
And this is a Mr. Music, the DJ original.
Translation:
그리고 이게 진짜
DJ 미스터 뮤직입니다

Subtitle: Welcome to the opening of The Good Plates.
Translation:
굿 플레이츠 개업식에
오신 걸 환영합니다

Subtitle: I just got that.
-[crowd laughs] -That's hilarious!
Anyway, at some point or another, every resident in this neighborhood
Translation:
어쨌든, 언젠가는
이 이웃의 모든 주민은

Subtitle: will fulfill his or her soul's true purpose.
Translation:
각자 영혼의 진실한
목적을 이루게 될 겁니다

Subtitle: Chef Patricia has done that tonight by opening this restaurant.
Translation:
퍼트리샤 셰프는 오늘 밤
이 식당을 열면서 그걸 이뤘어요

Subtitle: Now if you'd all like to take a look at tonight's menus...
That's right. With Michael's help, Chef Patricia has recreated
Translation:
맞아요, 마이클의 도움으로
퍼트리샤 셰프는 지상에서

Subtitle: each person's favorite meal on Earth.
Translation:
여러분이 제일 좋아했던 음식을
다시 만들어냈어요

Subtitle: Fun!
It's my Grandmother's maafe.
Fresh perch, slow-roasted in a peanut sauce.
Translation:
신선한 농어를 땅콩 소스에
천천히 구운 거죠

Subtitle: Almost makes me forget how miserable I am right now.
Translation:
제가 지금 얼마나 비참한지조차
잊게 해주네요

Subtitle: You want to try a bite?
Fish and peanut butter? No, I'm good. Thanks.
Tofu? Oh, man.
Imma order some jalapeno poppers.
[shushes] Be quiet and eat your white sponge.
-Janet? -Hi, there.
Hi. I didn't get a meal.
According to our files, your favorite meal was
Translation:
저희 기록에 따르면
당신의 최고의 음식은

Subtitle: the hunger strike you went on to protest Bolivian sex trafficking.
Oh, right. Of course I did that.
Tahani, great party. Check it out.
-Oh! [laughs] -Suspenders! [laughs]
So dumb.
So much dumber than belts. [laughs]
Oh, congratulations, Michael.
How's Jianyu doing? Is he opening up?
Mm, not yet.
But I can tell he wants to.
Translation:
그렇지만 말하고
싶어 하는 것 같아요

Subtitle: Don't worry. I've got a plan.
May I have your attention, please?
Later this evening, we will be enjoying Chef Patricia's delicious dessert,
Translation:
오늘 저녁 늦게, 퍼트리샤 셰프의
맛있는 후식이 준비되어 있어요

Subtitle: a stunning three-tiered cake that took her a full week to complete.
Translation:
완성하는 데에 일주일이나 걸린
놀라운 삼단 케이크지요

Subtitle: But first, I'd like to try something fun.
Translation:
하지만 먼저, 뭔가 재미난 일을
해 보려고요

Subtitle: Each one of you has a very special memory attached to the meal you're eating.
Translation:
여러분들이 지금 드시는 음식에
아주 특별한 추억이 있으실 겁니다

Subtitle: Why don't we go around the room and share our stories?
Translation:
한 사람씩 돌아가며
각자의 추억을 공유해 볼까요?

Subtitle: Who'd like to begin?
[chuckles] I'll start, Michael.
One day, I wasn't feeling so great,
Translation: 하루는, 제가 몸이 좀 안 좋아서

Subtitle: so I made myself a bowl of this chicken soup...
When it gets to you, say something short and boring about tofu.
Translation:
당신 차례가 되면 두부에 대한
간단하고 지루한 얘기를 하세요

Subtitle: No. I'm sick of pretending to be Jianyu, the tofu man.
Translation:
싫어요, 두부 인간 지안유인 척
하는 거 이제 지겨워요

Subtitle: I'm gonna tell the story about my real favorite meal.
Translation:
제가 진짜 좋아했던
음식 얘기를 할 거예요

Subtitle: -Which is? -The Buffalo wings
at Stupid Nick's Wing Dump in Gainesville.
Translation:
게인즈빌에 있는 멍청한
닉의 윙 덤프에서 팔던 거죠

Subtitle: Wings were free for ladies if they took their top off.
Oh, boy. [clears throat]
-Chidi, a word? -Yeah.
Anyway, that's how this simple soup saved over 10,000 lives.
Translation:
아무튼, 그게 이 수프로 만 명이
넘는 목숨을 구한 이야기입니다

Subtitle: If Jianyu starts talking about topless Buffalo wing restaurants,
Translation:
지안유가 상의 노출 버펄로 윙
식당 얘기를 시작하면

Subtitle: we're all screwed.
[Michael] Jianyu Li, a Taiwanese monk who took a vow of silence
Translation: 지안유 리 8살 이후로 한 번도 말하지 않은

Subtitle: at the age of eight and hasn't spoken since,
Translation:
묵언 수행을 해 온
타이완 수도승이

Subtitle: is ready to share with us.
Let me tell you about Stupid Nick.
We need a distraction. Right the fork now!
Translation: 지금 당장 관심을 끌 게 필요해요

Subtitle: No, no, no, no, no. [stutters] Eleanor?
Chef Patricia poured her heart and soul into this.
Translation:
퍼트리샤 셰프가 여기에
온 정성과 영혼을 쏟아부었어요

Subtitle: Destroying it would be a truly cruel act.
Translation:
이걸 부수는 건 정말
잔인한 행동이라고요

Subtitle: Yeah, no durr.
-No, no, no! Oh! -[sighs]
[Micheal] Sinkhole! Everyone out!
There's a sinkhole!
Glenn!
You broke the world.
It's not a compliment!
-[screaming] -[indistinct chatter]
Glenn, stay calm. We're gonna get you out of there.
And we'll put your soup in the fridge so it won't go to waste.
Translation:
그리고 당신 수프는 냉장고에
넣어서 상하지 않게 할게요

Subtitle: I know that may not be your number one concern right now, but...
Translation: 그게 지금 당장 제일 큰 문제는 아니겠지만요...

Subtitle: It was up there. It's real good soup.
Translation:
그 위에 있었어요
정말 좋은 수프요

Subtitle: Let's go.
Hey, buddy. You okay?
No.
Translation:
아니요, 방금 끝내주는 얘기를
할 참이었는데요

Subtitle: I was just about to tell an awesome story about a wing-eating contest that I lost,
Translation:
아니요, 방금 끝내주는 얘기를
할 참이었는데요 제가 졌던 윙 먹기 시합이랑

Subtitle: and a barfing contest that I won, but then a hole opened up in the ground.
Translation:
제가 이긴 토하기 시합에 대해서요
근데 그때 땅에 구멍이 생겼어요

Subtitle: I know. I made the hole to save you from yourself.
Translation:
알아요, 당신을 구하기 위해 내가
구멍을 만들었어요

Subtitle: You cannot let people know who you really are.
Translation:
사람들이 당신의 정체를
알게 할 수 없어요

Subtitle: It would be very, very bad.
[Pillboi] Beautiful, beautiful Jacksonville.
What's wrong, dog?
You look like you're freaking out.
Things are bad, Pillboi.
Acidcat is suing me for "bleach of contract."
I should have never pretended to be someone else.
Translation:
다른 사람인 척
하지 말았어야 했어

Subtitle: It could cost me all my dreams in life.
Translation:
내 인생의 모든 꿈을
대가로 치를지도 몰라

Subtitle: You got dreams in life? That's lit.
Of course I have dreams, man.
I don't want to be a DJ in Jacksonville forever.
Translation:
영원히 잭슨빌에서
DJ 하고 싶지는 않아

Subtitle: I want to DJ in Daytona, Tallahassee, Tampa, even.
Translation: 데이토나에서도 DJ 하고 싶고 탤러해시나 탬파에서도 하고 싶어

Subtitle: I want it all.
That's big goals, man.
I know, but I believe in myself.
Someday, the world will see what I already know,
Translation:
언젠가는, 세상이 내가 이미
알고 있는 걸 알아줄 거야

Subtitle: that Jason Mendoza is a beautiful, unique soul
Translation:
제이슨 멘도사는
이 세상에 줄 것이 많은

Subtitle: who has so much to give this world.
Okay, that's Acidcat's speedboat. Hand me the thing that blows it up.
Translation:
좋아, 저게 애시드캣의 모터보트야
날려버리게 그거 줘 봐

Subtitle: Michael, I hereby tender my resignation.
I can no longer in good conscience
coordinate any further events in The Good Place.
So, I am turning in my evening gloves.
Translation:
그래서 제 저녁 장갑도
돌려 드릴게요

Subtitle: -Tahani-- -Don't try to make me feel better.
Translation:
- 타하니...
- 제 기분 풀어주려 하지 마세요

Subtitle: The launch was a disaster.
Poor Jianyu was so terrified that I fear he may never speak again.
Translation:
불쌍한 지안유는 너무 놀라서
다시는 말을 안 할지도 몰라요

Subtitle: My hair is barely cascading down my shoulders.
Translation:
제 머리카락은 겨우
어깨 아래로 흘러내리고 있고요

Subtitle: Tahani, please.
I know your journey with Jianyu has been frustrating,
but your situation is actually very typical.
Translation:
하지만 당신 상황은 사실
아주 전형적이에요

Subtitle: Soul mates sometimes take months to really click.
Translation:
소울메이트는 정말 연결되기까지
몇 달씩 걸리기도 해요

Subtitle: You have to be patient.
And if anyone should take the blame for the restaurant disaster, it's me.
Translation:
그리고 누군가 식당 참사에 대한
책임을 져야 한다면, 그건 저예요

Subtitle: I thought this neighborhood's troubles were behind us.
Now I fear the worst.
Translation:
이제 최악의 상황이 올까 봐
두려워요

Subtitle: Michael,
I hereby rescind the tendering of my resignation.
We must keep the neighborhood together.
-What can I do? -Oh,
well, the sinkhole should be repairing itself in about three days.
Translation:
음, 싱크홀은 사흘 정도면
저절로 복구될 거예요

Subtitle: Well, as soon as it does, we shall re-launch the restaurant.
I'll hang posters to get the word out,
and in the meantime, I'll host a brunch party every morning
Translation:
그동안 제가 매일 아침
브런치 파티를 열어서

Subtitle: to lift people's spirits.
-Ah! -While you repair the universe, I shall prepare the eggs.
Translation:
당신이 우주를 수리하는 동안
전 달걀을 준비하지요

Subtitle: Oh, fanciful wordplay.
Indeed. That is the Tahani that you know and love.
Translation:
그럼요, 이게 바로 당신이 알고
사랑하는 타하니지요

Subtitle: -So what do we do here? -There's nothing to do.
Translation:
- 그래서 이제 어떡하죠?
- 할 수 있는 건 없어요

Subtitle: He's just gonna blab
and get him and me both sent to The Bad Place.
Translation:
그와 저를 잡아서
배드 플레이스로 보내겠지요

Subtitle: It's hopeless.
I can't believe I'm doing this, but, Jason,
Translation:
내가 이러는 걸
믿을 수 없지만, 제이슨

Subtitle: please come to my classroom.
I will teach you ethics, like I'm doing with Eleanor.
And if you work hard and absorb the material,
you just might be able to earn your place here.
Translation:
여기에 당신 자리를
얻을 수 있을지도 몰라요

Subtitle: No, I'm good.
Dude, Chidi is giving you a lifeline right now,
Translation:
치디가 지금
생명줄을 던져 준 거예요

Subtitle: and you need to take it because you suck.
Translation:
그거 잡아야 해요
왜냐하면 당신은 썩었거든

Subtitle: -You suck! -I know!
That's what I'm trying to tell you. We both suck.
Translation:
제가 말하려던 게 그거예요
우린 둘 다 썩었어요

Subtitle: You know who doesn't suck? Chidi.
Translation:
썩지 않은 게 누군지 알아요?
치디예요

Subtitle: He is putting himself in danger to help us,
Translation:
우리를 도우려고 자신을
위험에 빠뜨리고 있어요

Subtitle: because he, unlike us, is an amazing person.
Translation:
왜냐하면, 그는 우리랑 다르게
놀라운 사람이거든요

Subtitle: I didn't get into heaven to go to school.
Translation:
학교나 가려고 천국에
들어온 게 아니에요

Subtitle: You didn't get into heaven at all, shirt-for-brains.
Translation:
당신은 절대 천국에 들어올 수
없었어요, 구제 불능 씨

Subtitle: I just want to be myself.
That's a very, very bad idea. Do not be yourself.
Translation:
그건 정말 나쁜 생각이에요
당신 자신이 되지 말아야 해요

Subtitle: You need to be a better version of yourself, okay?
Translation:
더 나은 당신이 되어야 해요
알겠어요?

Subtitle: And I do too. And our only hope right now is this kind, selfless, amazing nerd.
Translation:
저도 마찬가지고요
지금 우리의 유일한 희망은 이 친절하고 이타적이고 놀라운
괴짜뿐이에요

Subtitle: Think about that.
[stutters] Do you have to call me a nerd so much?
I said a lot of other nice things, okay? Toughen up, nerd.
Translation:
다른 좋은 말도 많이 했어요
됐죠? 강해지세요, 괴짜 씨

Subtitle: Let's get crackin', Teach.
I read this entire David Hume book, and then I read it again
Translation:
이 데이비드 흄 책을 다 읽었어요
그리고 다시 읽었죠 처음에는 이해가 안 갔으니까요

Subtitle: because I didn't understand it the first time,
and now I'm ready to go.
Wow. Uh, that's really impressive.
Uh, where's Jianyu?
Honestly, I don't even know if he's coming.
I am here to learn about ethnics.
Wow! That's great, man! Um, I mean... [stutters] It's ethics but that's great.
[whispers] Pretty sure it's "ethnics."
Hey, buddy, I'm proud of you.
This is your first step towards not sucking.
Translation:
이건 썩지 않게 되기 위한
첫 번째 단계예요

Subtitle: Cool. I just have two questions.
When are football tryouts?
And does this school have a prom?
Translation:
그리고 이 학교
졸업 파티는 있나요?

Subtitle: Oh, no.
Oh, wow.
For the first time ever,
I'm the smartest kid in class.
Good afternoon, Eleanor. What can I get you today?
[Eleanor] Whoa! Lot of new flavors.
Michael felt bad about the sinkhole,
so he wanted to give you all a little treat.
Translation:
여러분 모두에게
조금 특별한 걸 대접하고 싶대요

Subtitle: I recommend "Full Cell Phone Battery."
Translation:
충전된 휴대폰 배터리 맛을
추천해 드려요

Subtitle: It somehow tastes how I felt when my cell phone was fully charged.
Translation:
왠지 제 휴대폰이 완전히
충전됐을 때의 느낌이 들어요

Subtitle: Oh, I'm so relaxed.
But they all look good. This might take me a while.
Translation:
하지만 전부 맛있어 보여
결정하기 힘들어요

Subtitle: You know what, Gunnar, why don't you go ahead?
-Thanks so much, Eleanor. -Mmm-hmm.
[Janet] What can I get you, Gunnar? [Gunnar] Hi, Janet.
-Can I have some Folded Laundry? -[Janet] Coming up.
Chidi!
You'll never believe it.
I was at the frozen yogurt place and I didn't know what I wanted,
so I turned to the guy behind me, and I was like,
"Why don't you go ahead?" [gasps]
Just like that! "Why don't you go ahead?"
-[stammers] Okay... -Dude, you don't understand!
Translation: 그래서요? 이 양반 이해를 못 하시네!

Subtitle: I never did stuff like that when I was on Earth.
Translation:
난 지구에서 그런 일을
한 적이 없단 말이에요

Subtitle: But now, thanks to your "good person" lessons,
Translation:
하지만 지금은 '좋은 사람'이란
당신 수업 덕분에

Subtitle: I didn't hold up the line.
I didn't even try a dozen samples I didn't want
Translation:
내가 막고 서 있다고 뭐라고 한
그놈을 괴롭히려고

Subtitle: just to spite some jerk who told me I was holding up the line.
Translation:
열두 개가 넘는 샘플을
맛보지도 않았다고요

Subtitle: -You do that? -No, Chidi, I used to do that.
Translation: 그런 짓도 해요? 아니, 치디, 예전에 그랬다고요

Subtitle: Now I do selfless things without even thinking about it.
Translation:
지금은 생각하지 않고도
이타적인 행동을 하고 있어요

Subtitle: -That's great. I'm... I'm proud of you. -[sighs]
-So where's our yogurt? -[groans] I forgot it.
Translation: 그래서 우리 건 어디 있어요? 까먹었어요

Subtitle: [groans] Oh... Can you go? I don't want to go all the way back.
Translation:
당신이 갈래요?
왔던 길을 다시 가고 싶지 않아요

Subtitle: I ran all the way here and it was so hot.
I mean, I will happily get it, because I told you I would.
Translation:
내 말은, 내가 기꺼이 하겠다고요
그렇게 하겠다고 했으니까

Subtitle: Good person.
So, to sum up, Utilitarianism posits that the correct choice
is the one that causes the most good or pleasure,
and the least pain and suffering.
Translation:
최소한의 아픔과 고통을 준다고
상정하고 있어요

Subtitle: I like this one. It's simple.
Ugh... Screw all the other complicated theories,
-why didn't you start with this one? -Ah, but here's the problem.
Translation:
- 왜 이걸로 시작하지 않았어요?
- 하지만 문제가 있어요

Subtitle: If all that matters is the sum total of "goodness,"
then you can justify any number of bad actions,
Translation:
나쁜 행위가 얼마가 됐든
정당화할 수 있다는 겁니다

Subtitle: like torturing one innocent person to save a hundred,
Translation:
많은 사람을 구하기 위해서
혹은 전쟁을 막기 위해

Subtitle: or preemptive war...
Oh, dude, I get it.
It's like, I knew this girl Sheila...
She was a black market alligator dealer with a pierced jawbone.
Um... Okay, what?
Sheila was gonna get married to my boy, Donkey Doug
Translation:
실라는 내 친구 동키 더그랑
결혼하기로 했었고

Subtitle: and make him move to Sarasota.
It would've broken up my whole break dancing crew
Translation:
근데 그럼 내 브레이크 댄스팀을
깨버릴 것 같았어요

Subtitle: and Donkey Doug was our best pop-and-locker.
So I hid a bunch of stolen boogie boards in Sheila's garage and called the cops.
Translation:
그래서 도난당한 부기 보드들을
실라 창고에 숨기고 경찰을 불렀죠

Subtitle: I framed one innocent gator dealer to save a 60-person dance crew.
Translation:
60명이 속한 댄스팀을 구하려고
무고한 1명에게 누명을 씌웠어요

Subtitle: Shockingly, that is a relevant example of the Utilitarian dilemma. Well done.
Thanks! Um...
-Uh, yes, Jianyu? -Can I be excused?
Translation:
- 네, 지안유?
- 저 먼저 가도 될까요?

Subtitle: Tahani's doing a brunch party and I want to get there
Translation:
타하니가 연 브런치 파티에
미니 와플이 다 떨어지기 전에

Subtitle: before all the mini-waffles run out.
-Go ahead, man. -Yes!
[sighs] So, you want to roll right into another lesson?
I am revved up to learn, man. My brain is horny!
Translation:
배우는 데 점점 박차를
가하고 있어요, 뇌가 흥분했어요!

Subtitle: Um... Can we take a little break?
I've been standing at this chalkboard all day.
Oh, yeah, I get it.
Oh, you could, um, grade my paper I wrote on the concept of dharma.
Translation:
불교의 법 개념에 관해 쓴
내 보고서를 채점해도 되고요

Subtitle: Six pages, and I didn't even do that thing
where I try to make it longer by starting every sentence with
"Interestingly..."
Sure, I'll do that and, uh...
We can start another lesson.
-[indistinct chatter] -[Michael] Ah! Tahani.
I've been working on my Western Hemisphere brunch banter.
Translation:
제가 서반구 브런치 농담을
연습 중인데

Subtitle: Tell me what you think.
That New Yorker article was crazy.
You haven't seen Hamilton?
Hey, did you hear about Stephanie?
-Very well done, Michael. -Hi, there!
We have a Category 55 Emergency Doomsday Crisis.
-A Category 55 Emergency Doomsday Crisis? -Mmm-hmm.
Translation:
55번 긴급 종말 위기? 죄송한데 55번 긴급 종말 위기가
뭔가요?

Subtitle: Sorry, what is a Category 55 Emergency Doomsday Crisis?
It's nothing, it's a tiny little inconvenience.
Tahani, dear, could you show us to a private room
Translation:
친절한 타하니
아무도 우리를 보거나 듣지 못하는

Subtitle: where no one can see or hear us, even if I yell very loudly out of fear?
Translation:
사적인 공간이 있나요? 내가
크게 소리 질러도 모를 정도로요?

Subtitle: [Janet] It appears that the sinkhole is not repairing itself.
Translation:
"55번 긴급 종말 위기
싱크홀" 싱크홀이 스스로
복구되지 않고 있어요

Subtitle: This is very bad, Janet.
We have to go into the sinkhole and fix it by hand.
Get the tools.
-Sorry, can I be of any service? -Ah! Tahani.
Didn't see you there. Uh, no, no.
Translation:
거기 있는지 몰랐네요
괜찮아요, 단지 커다란 싱크홀에

Subtitle: We're just having a slight problem with the enormous sinkhole.
Translation:
거기 있는지 몰랐네요
괜찮아요, 단지 커다란 싱크홀에 약간의 문제가 있을 뿐이에요

Subtitle: Yes, I meant to tell you... I walked past it last night and I...
Translation: 네, 제가 말씀드리려고 했어요 어젯밤 그곳을 지나다가

Subtitle: I actually saw it get a little bit bigger.
Translation:
실은 싱크홀이
조금 더 커진 걸 봤어요

Subtitle: [gasps and exclaims] It got bigger?
Translation:
실은 싱크홀이
조금 더 커진 걸 봤어요 커졌다고요?

Subtitle: [stammers] Ah, well, that's so normal. Uh...
This is the reaction I have when things are incredibly mundane and expected.
Translation:
전 지극히 일상적이고
예상했던 일들에 이런 반응을 보여요

Subtitle: I'm gonna leave now at my regular pace, as I do in most scenarios.
Translation: 전 이제 가봐야겠어요 평상시대로 대부분의 경우에서 하듯이

Subtitle: Finally! Let's get back to it.
Whip out that chalkboard, big boy, show me what you're working with.
Translation:
칠판을 지우고
선생님, 이번에는 뭘 할지 보여 주시죠

Subtitle: Actually, I was going to head into town and pick up some...
Translation:
사실 시내로 가서
뭘 좀 가져오려고...

Subtitle: -Blankets. -Great, I'll grab my sweater.
I can practice letting people cut in front of me.
Translation:
사람들이 새치기해도
아무렇지 않은 연습을 해볼래요

Subtitle: You know, uh, I just realized
that I have blankets, so I'm going to take a nap
Translation:
나 담요 가지고 있어요
이미 있는 담요로

Subtitle: using the several blankets that I already have. Good night.
Uh-uh-uh-uh-uh. What's wrong? Out with it.
Fine, I'm just tired, need a break. No big deal.
Translation:
그냥 피곤해서 쉬고 싶은 거죠
별일 아니에요

Subtitle: The way you're talking to me right now?
"Everything's cool, no big deal," I know that move.
Translation:
'다 괜찮아, 별일 아니야'
그게 무슨 의미인지 안다고요

Subtitle: When I told a boyfriend something was "no big deal,"
it meant anything from "I just bought weed from your nephew,"
Translation:
'방금 네 조카한테서 대마초 샀어'
라는 의미에서부터

Subtitle: to "I secretly befriended your ex-girlfriend last year,
Translation:
'비밀리에 네 예전 여자친구와
작년에 친구가 되었는데'

Subtitle: "things got out of hand, and now I'm her bridesmaid."
Translation:
'일이 꼬여서 신부 들러리가 됐다'
까지를 의미했다고요

Subtitle: Wow.
Okay, well, in this case, it really is no big deal.
Dude, you're hiding something!
-What's wrong? -Nothing!
What is wrong?
Jianyu, 2nd.
Oh, well done, my love. [sniffles]
So where am I?
Eleanor, 6th? Come on. [scoffs]
Oh, no. I'm second to last.
Mummy, I made you this.
It's the pretty bird we saw in the garden.
Thank you, Tahani. It's very competent.
I made a bird, as well.
I worked in a reflective alloy, holding up a mirror to mankind
Translation:
유광 합금으로 작업했고요
인류가 힘없는 동물들에게

Subtitle: and its mistreatment of these defenseless animals.
Excellent, Kamilah.
I sense the influence of Brancusi and Kapoor.
Translation:
브랑쿠시와 카푸르의
영향을 받은 게 느껴지네

Subtitle: It seems you're moving out of your structural period,
and more into conceptual abstraction.
Translation:
좀 더 개념적 추상으로
접근하는 것 같구나

Subtitle: Good eye, Mother.
I grew tired of objective representation. I trust my audience.
Translation: 이제 사물 묘사는 질렸어요 보시는 분들의 안목을 믿어요

Subtitle: -My birdie has a hat. -Yes, well done, Tahani.
Translation: 제 새는 모자도 썼어요 그래, 잘했구나, 타하니

Subtitle: -[Eleanor repeatedly] What's wrong? -[Chidi] Nothing's wrong.
-What's wrong? -Nothing's wrong.
-What's wrong? What's wrong? -Nothing's wrong. Nothing's wrong?
-Would you stop doing that? -What's wrong? What's wrong?
-Okay, fine! -What's wrong?
You want to know what's wrong? You are a full-time job.
Translation:
뭐가 문제인지 알고 싶어요?
당신은 풀타임 직장 같아요

Subtitle: I wake up, there's Eleanor.
I spend all day teaching Eleanor.
And then it's, "Good night, Eleanor."
Oh, this is a nice dream, my grandma's here.
Translation:
꿈에 할머니가 나오네
좋은 꿈인가 봐

Subtitle: Wait, she's got Eleanor's face! And tentacles for some reason.
Translation:
잠깐, 할머니가 엘리너 얼굴을
하고 있네! 무슨 이유인지 문어발이 달렸고

Subtitle: I thought you liked teaching me. So now I'm just some huge burden for you?
Translation:
당신이 날 가르치는 걸
좋아한다고 생각했어요 그럼 이제 당신에게
커다란 짐일 뿐이네요?

Subtitle: Yes! Of course you are! I am in paradise!
I should be doing paradise things,
like rowing out on a lake with a good bottle of wine,
Translation:
호수에서 노를 저으며
좋은 와인을 마시면서

Subtitle: reading French poetry.
That's your idea of paradise?
You know, and I can't stop helping you,
Translation:
나는 당신을 돕는 걸
그만둘 수 없어요

Subtitle: because then I am shirking my ethical duty.
Translation:
그럼 난 윤리적 의무를
회피하는 게 되니까

Subtitle: It's an impossible position!
You know what, if you're so stressed from writing on a chalkboard,
Translation:
칠판에 끄적거리는 일이
그렇게 스트레스 받을 일이면 그냥 떠나버리지 그래요?

Subtitle: why don't you just leave?
We can pretend to be soul mates in public,
but other than that, we don't have to see each other!
Translation:
그 외에는
우리 서로 보지 않기로 하죠!

Subtitle: -Fine with me! I'll move out right now. -Fine!
[Michael over speakers] Good afternoon.
As you all may remember, a sinkhole recently opened up in the town center.
Translation:
모두 아시다시피
최근 도심 가운데 싱크홀이 생겼습니다

Subtitle: The situation, sadly, has worsened.
Starting right now, no one may go outside
under any circumstances.
Leaving your homes could result in catastrophic damage,
Translation:
집을 떠나면 엄청 큰 재앙을
초래할 수 있습니다

Subtitle: to you and to the very fabric of the universe.
Translation:
당신뿐 아니라
우주의 미세한 구조에까지 말이죠

Subtitle: Okay, bye.
-Or we could both just stay here. -[sighs]
[Michael over speakers] We hope you enjoy your eternal stay in The Good Place.
Translation:
굿 플레이스에서
영원한 삶을 즐기시길 바랍니다

Subtitle: Take advantage of our day spa,
or Janet... A magical assistant who can get you whatever you want.
Translation:
원하는 것이 무엇이든지
비서 재닛이 가져다드릴 것입니다

Subtitle: You mind turning that off? It's been playing on a loop for two days.
Translation: 그것 좀 끄면 안 돼요? 이틀 내내 계속 나오고 있잖아요

Subtitle: The whole Neighborhood is offline. We only get the welcome channel.
Translation: 동네 전체에 방송이 끊겨서 이 채널 외에는 볼 수 없어요

Subtitle: I would love to not watch TV, but you canceled school.
Translation: 나도 TV 보기 싫지만 당신이 수업을 취소했잖아요

Subtitle: [gasps] What have you done to me, you monster?
Translation:
대체 나한테 무슨 짓을 한 거죠
괴물 씨?

Subtitle: Look at all these dishes piling up.
I used to just throw them in the sink,
and they'd be magically cleaned by morning.
I did that. I cleaned the dishes.
Translation:
내가 했어요
그 설거지 내가 했다고요

Subtitle: Oh.
Then what's up with these bad boys?
You are unbelievable.
Are you still upset? You're not over it yet?
Translation:
아직도 화가 난 거예요? - 아직도 안 풀렸어요?
- 어떻게 풀려요?

Subtitle: How can I be over it? We haven't discussed it or even spoken for days.
Translation:
- 아직도 안 풀렸어요?
- 어떻게 풀려요? 며칠 동안 그 얘기는
꺼내지도 않았는데

Subtitle: Well, it sounds like you've had a really nice "vacation"
Translation:
그럼 당신은 엄청 좋은
휴가를 즐긴 것 아닌가요?

Subtitle: from your "full-time job."
Get your story straight, bro!
-[banging on door] -[Michael] Hey, guys, it's Michael.
Hi, Michael, what a lovely surprise.
Oh, I'd love to make small talk. I've been practicing, too.
Translation:
이런 소소한 대화 좋아요
그것도 연습 중이거든요

Subtitle: I'm amazing at it, but I'm in a bit of a rush here.
Translation:
나 진짜 잘해요
하지만 지금 좀 바빠서 말이죠

Subtitle: This is Bart and Nina.
They live right next door to the, uh, sinkhole,
so they obviously need a place to stay.
I was wondering, as my assistant, maybe you could put them up for a while?
Translation:
당신이 내 비서로서
혹시 이분들을 잠시 받아 줄 수 있지 않을까 했답니다

Subtitle: Oh, of course. Don't think twice.
Okay, shouldn't take long. Between an hour and, um, 11 months.
Translation:
알겠어요
오래 있진 않을 거예요 한 시간에서... 11개월 사이

Subtitle: Somewhere in there. Okay, bye.
Don't go outside.
Hello, everyone, and welcome to day three of our brunch siege.
Translation:
안녕하세요, 여러분
브런치 포위 상태 3일 차에 접어들었습니다

Subtitle: I stayed up all night to plan a full day of fun activities.
Translation:
온종일 즐길 계획을 세우느라
밤을 꼬박 새웠어요

Subtitle: Just check the schedule I made.
Tahani, you are truly the best.
Yes, you would think so, wouldn't you, Henriette?
Still second to last.
Tahani!
This auction threatens to be an embarrassing failure.
Translation:
이번 경매는 정말 처참하게
실패할 것만 같구나

Subtitle: 5.2 million isn't bad.
It's very "middle-thermometer."
Your public failure is our public failure.
Translation:
너의 공개적 실패는
우리의 공개적 실패와 같아

Subtitle: You know what has to be done.
I'm very pleased to announce that there has been an addition to today's docket.
Translation:
오늘 판매 목록에 추가될 새로운 상품이 있다는 걸
알려드리게 되어 매우 기쁩니다

Subtitle: -I'm sure you all know my sister, Kamilah. -[all cheering and applauding]
Translation:
여러분 모두 아시는 제 동생
카밀라입니다 "총 모금액"

Subtitle: [chuckles] Yes. Kamilah.
Kamilah, of course, is the youngest person ever
to graduate from Oxford University.
She's a world-class painter, social activist, iconoclast,
Translation:
세계적인 화가, 사회 운동가이자
인습 타파주의자이며

Subtitle: Olympic gold medalist for archery,
a BAFTA Award-winner for her documentary on her Grammy Award-winning album,
Translation:
그래미상을 받은
본인 앨범에 관한 다큐멘터리로 바프타상을 수상했죠

Subtitle: and the person voted "Most Likely to be Banksy."
Translation:
익명의 아티스트 뱅크시의 실체로
유력한 후보로도 꼽혔고요

Subtitle: [laughs] So without further ado, take it away from me!
Translation: 더 말할 필요 없이 저한테서 뺏어가 보세요!

Subtitle: Sorry, I mean take it away, Kamilah.
I am auctioning off a lunch date with me.
Translation:
저는 저와의 점심 식사를
팔도록 하겠습니다

Subtitle: The bidding shall commence at £3,000,000.
Five million!
[Nina] Thank you guys so much.
-Sorry for the imposition. -Oh... Bah!
Oh, well, if you want to know the truth,
we asked Michael if we could stay with you.
Translation:
저희가 당신과 지내고 싶다고
마이클에게 부탁했어요

Subtitle: We are obsessed with your relationship.
Always whispering, locking yourself in the house all day.
Translation:
항상 속삭이고
온종일 집 안에만 있잖아요

Subtitle: I thought I was an expert in true love 'cause of my old job.
Translation:
제 예전 직업 때문에 전 제가
참사랑에 관한 전문가라 생각했죠

Subtitle: [chuckles] But I have a lot to learn from you guys.
Your job? What was your job?
I was a marriage counselor.
You could say I wrote the book on healthy relationships.
Translation:
건강한 관계에 대한 책을 썼다고도
할 수 있죠

Subtitle: -And I did! [laughs] -[laughs]
It's called, How to Spot Problems in a Marriage From a 100 Miles Away.
Translation:
'100마일 밖에서 결혼 생활
문제 찾아내기'라는 책이에요

Subtitle: [both] Oh, cool.
-Really cool. -Cool.
-Really, really cool. -Cool, cool.
And what about you, Bart?
Oh, well, my job wasn't nearly as interesting.
I started a company that investigated identity theft.
Analyzing body language, tracking and catching people
pretending to be someone they're not.
[scoffs] It's snooze, am I right?
They're gonna catch us! This is an extremely precarious situation!
I am vexed, Eleanor!
A marriage counselor and a human lie detector
isn't my first choice for company, either.
Translation:
저한테도 같이 지내고 싶은 사람
1순위는 아니에요

Subtitle: But they have no reason to suspect us!
Translation:
그렇지만 그들이 우리를
의심할 이유가 없잖아요!

Subtitle: Plus, I think they may have actually just come here to, you know, swing.
Translation:
그리고 저 사람들은
넷이 해보자고 온 것 같아요

Subtitle: I say we do it.
It'll get 'em to stop asking questions.
No, I... I am not going to have sex with someone
Translation:
아니요, 난 나한테
말 거는 걸 막으려고

Subtitle: to get them to stop talking to me!
Really? You and I are very different.
-Yeah, I noticed! -You know what, man?
I have spent every second in this place
worried I was gonna get caught, but if we go down right now,
Translation:
들킬까 봐 걱정만 했어요
하지만 지금 들키면

Subtitle: that's on you, okay?
Oh, you spend all your time teaching a charming, awesome lady?
Translation:
그동안 매력 쩔고 끝내주는 여자를
가르치며 지냈는데

Subtitle: How sad for you. Face it, dude.
I'm the best thing that ever happened to you. Because guess what, Chidi?
Translation:
난 당신에게 일어난 일 중
가장 최고의 일이에요 왜일까요, 치디?

Subtitle: -Ya basic! -[sighs] Eleanor...
Yeah, I know, you want to do that thing
Translation:
그래요, 알아요, 당신은
우리가 다투고 싸우다가

Subtitle: where we're arguing and fighting, but then suddenly it's like,
Translation:
그래요, 알아요, 당신은
우리가 다투고 싸우다가 갑자기 '오, 이거 섹시하군'

Subtitle: "Whoa! This is hot," and we start making out.
Dream on! Or, whatever, fine, let's just do it.
Translation: 꿈 깨시죠! 아니면 뭐, 까짓 거 해보자고요

Subtitle: No, Eleanor, look.
So how much of that did you hear?
We couldn't hear you, but I'm an expert
in non-verbal communication, and it is clear...
Translation:
비언어적 대화의 전문가라서
그 상황은 정확히...

Subtitle: You are in conflict.
We're not judging you. This has been a tough couple of weeks.
Translation: 당신들을 비판하는 건 아니에요 최근 몇 주 동안 힘들었잖아요

Subtitle: I'm sure the stress of the sinkhole has caused lots of soul mate squabbles.
Translation:
싱크홀로 인한 스트레스가
많은 소울메이트를 다투게 한 게 분명해요

Subtitle: Yes, that's what it is. A squabble.
-We're squabbling. -Squabble, squabble!
[Nina] I can help.
I'm gonna take your relationship and put it under a microscope
and dig and poke and prod
until you are back to soul mate harmony.
Eleanor, why don't you--
She never does the dishes. I have to do them all the time.
Translation:
엘리너는 절대 설거지 안 해요
제가 항상 하죠

Subtitle: -We just have different interests. -[Nina] Mmm-hmm.
I like relaxing, he likes getting on my case about the dishes.
Translation:
전 쉬는 걸 좋아하고, 치디는
설거지에 대해 따지는 걸 좋아하죠

Subtitle: I'm getting a lot of repressed anger.
I suspected this when I arrived, but now I'm sure.
Translation:
처음 왔을 때부터 의심했지만
이제는 확실해요

Subtitle: -You are hiding something. -What on Earth would I be--
Translation:
- 당신 뭔가 숨기고 있어요
- 제가 대체 뭘...

Subtitle: No, no, no, not you.
Him.
[over speakers] Please go back inside. It isn't safe to be out of your home.
Translation:
다시 집으로 돌아가십시오 집 밖으로 나오시는 건
안전하지 않습니다

Subtitle: Please go back inside.
Janet, could you see what's wrong?
-Everything. -Oh... [groans]
My goodness! It's even worse than I thought.
Translation: 세상에! 생각했던 것보다 더 안 좋네요

Subtitle: Tahani, what're you doing here?
Well, everyone else might be okay staying inside, but I wanted to help.
Translation:
다른 이들은 집 안에 있는 게
괜찮을지 몰라도 저는 돕고 싶어요

Subtitle: So I've brought some cheer and sustenance to raise your spirits.
Translation:
그래서 사기를 올려드리려고
약간의 응원과 음식을 가져왔어요

Subtitle: Look, I made donut holes.
Do you get it? "Donut holes"?
Sinkhole. Funny, no?
Translation:
싱크홀 - 재미있지 않아요?
- 재미없어요, 너무 일러요

Subtitle: No, too soon. By exactly nine days.
Translation:
- 재미있지 않아요?
- 재미없어요, 너무 일러요 정확히 9일 일러요

Subtitle: Tahani, this sinkhole is incredibly dangerous.
If a human gets too close to it, there could be disastrous side effects.
Translation:
인간이 여기 너무 가까이 가면
심각한 부작용이 생길 수 있어요

Subtitle: -What's... What's happening to me? -Oh, that's one of the side effects.
Translation: 저 왜 이러죠? 그게 부작용 중 하나예요

Subtitle: Janet, knock her out while we still have time.
Translation:
재닛, 더 큰 문제가 발생하기 전에
기절시켜요

Subtitle: Knock me out? What does that--
Guys, really, it's no big deal.
"It's not a big deal" is nearly always code
for "something is wrong."
Boom! That's what I said. I should've been a marriage counselor.
Translation: 옳소! 제가 그렇게 말했죠 결혼 생활 상담사가 될 걸 그랬네

Subtitle: Okay, Chidi, out with it.
What is so unsatisfying about your soul mate relationship?
Be honest, Chidi.
Be, like, the exact right amount of honest
so that we can both be happy.
Translation: 우리 둘 다 행복할 수 있도록

Subtitle: I never had a soul mate on Earth.
Translation:
저는 지구에서 소울메이트를
가져본 적이 없어요

Subtitle: I never even really had a girlfriend that I loved.
And when I got here, and Michael said I would
finally meet my actual soul mate, I was so excited.
Translation:
진짜 소울메이트를
만나게 될 거라고 했을 때 정말 신이 났어요

Subtitle: And it isn't...
Exactly what I thought.
You've never had an intense relationship before.
Translation:
지금까지 강렬한 관계를
가져본 적이 없군요

Subtitle: This is all uncharted territory.
No wonder you're so tense. [chuckles]
You know, Nina and I are skilled in the art of massage.
Translation:
그런데, 니나와 나는
마사지 기술이 있어요

Subtitle: -Uh, not erotic massage. -Mmm.
Although, it can be, and it often leads there, anyway...
Translation:
하는 방법도 알고 때때로
그런 쪽으로 빠지기도 하지만...

Subtitle: Okay, well, you know what?
You guys have given us so much to think about.
Translation:
두 분이 저희에게 생각할 걸
많이 던져주셨어요

Subtitle: And I think we should go to bed. Just the two of us, alone. Just us.
Translation:
그리고 이제 자러 가야
할 것 같아요 딱 저희 둘만요, 단둘이요

Subtitle: [whispers] I know it's not the right time, but I told you.
Translation:
상황에 맞는 말은 아니지만
내 말이 맞죠?

Subtitle: Tahani, wake up, dear.
Michael.
Did it work?
Did I fix the sinkhole? Am I a heroine?
No, you did something catastrophically stupid
and we had to knock you unconscious.
Why in the world did you go outside?
Because I saw the rankings in the manual.
That manual is only meant to be seen by Architects and Janets.
Translation:
그 설명서는 설계자와 재닛만
보게 되어 있어요

Subtitle: It's got some very sensitive material.
Plus some song lyrics I've been working on,
Translation:
게다가, 내가 작업 중인
노래 가사도 있어요

Subtitle: and I'd rather not let people see those until they're finished.
Translation:
완성될 때까지 다른 사람들이
보지 않았으면 하거든요

Subtitle: But, anyway, why did seeing the rankings unravel you so?
Translation:
어쨌든, 순위를 본 게
왜 그리 이성을 잃을 일이죠?

Subtitle: I was so sorry to hear of your parents' passing.
Please bear with me as I share their last will and testament.
Translation:
그분들의 마지막 유언장 내용을
들려 드리겠어요

Subtitle: "To Kamilah, we have left £68,000,000,
the home in Kensington, the yacht, and other assorted weekend boats."
Translation:
'켄싱턴에 있는 집, 요트' '그리고 다른
주말 보트들을 남긴다'

Subtitle: Well, what did they leave their second favorite child?
Translation:
그분들이 두 번째로 사랑한
자식에게는 뭘 남겼나요?

Subtitle: There's still quite a lot of, uh, money and property that goes to you.
Translation:
당신에게 상속될 꽤 많은
돈과 재산이 남아 있어요

Subtitle: There is one issue, however.
They have, um, spelled your name incorrectly in the will.
Translation:
유언장에 당신 이름 철자를
잘못 쓰셨어요

Subtitle: You've got to be kidding me.
It says, "We bequeath the rest of our estate to Tahini."
Translation:
이렇게 쓰여 있어요, '남은 재산은
타히니에게 물려준다'

Subtitle: Like the sauce.
You know what? I don't want the money.
Translation: 있잖아요 저 돈 받고 싶지 않아요

Subtitle: My sister can have it all.
My whole life, I have lived in your shadow,
but now I'm going to step out of it.
Translation: 이제 그 그늘 밖으로 나갈 거야

Subtitle: I am going to reach heights of success and sophistication
Translation:
넌 겨우 꿈이나 꿀 수 있는
성공과 교양을

Subtitle: that you can only dream of.
Your cardigan's on inside out.
I know! It's a new trend that I am starting.
Just one example of how I'm going to step out of your shadow.
Translation:
내가 네 그늘에서
어떻게 벗어나는지 보여주는 예라고

Subtitle: Oh, I'm sorry that I looked at the rankings, Michael.
But I just don't understand how I'm so low.
Translation:
그런데 제가 왜 그렇게 낮은지
이해를 못 하겠어요

Subtitle: My entire life, I have tried to be extraordinary,
but it just never seemed to be enough.
And you thought you could increase your ranking
Translation:
그래서 싱크홀 고치는 걸 도우면
순위가 올라갈 거라고

Subtitle: by helping us fix the sinkhole.
Tahani, the point evaluations stop the moment you die.
Translation:
타하니, 점수 평가는
죽은 순간에 멈춰요

Subtitle: But also, out of literally billions,
Translation:
하지만 당신은
수십억 명 중에서 뽑힌

Subtitle: you were one of the most remarkable people on Earth.
Translation:
지구에서 가장 대단한
사람 중에 하나라고요

Subtitle: You have nothing left to prove, to anyone.
-[beeping] -Hi, there.
The sinkhole has begun to repair itself.
-[Tahani gasps] -It has?
-Could it be... Did I? -But how...
-"Tahani saves the--" -No, no, no.
Still not you. You have nothing to do with it.
Translation:
이번에도 당신은 아니에요
아무 관계 없어요

Subtitle: We've got to leave immediately.
[Michael over speakers] It's now safe to go outside.
It's now safe to go outside.
-Morning, teach! -Mornin'.
What's this about?
Well, here's what I realized.
It's not just that helping me is a full-time job
Translation: 날 돕는 게 의무감을 느껴서 하는

Subtitle: that you feel you have to do.
The real problem is, that the more you help me,
the greater the chance is that I can stay here,
Translation:
내가 여기 머물 수 있을
확률이 올라가고

Subtitle: and me staying here means you'll never get a real soul mate.
Translation:
내가 여기 머문다는 건 당신이 진짜 소울메이트를
못 만나게 되는 걸 뜻하죠

Subtitle: -I'm basically a Utilitarian nightmare. -[chuckles]
Every ounce of my happiness leads to a ton of pain for you.
Translation:
내 모든 행복은
당신에게 크나큰 고통을 주죠

Subtitle: So... Every time the simple fact of my existence starts to bum you out,
Translation: 그래서 내 존재라는 간단한 사실이 당신을 힘들게 할 때마다

Subtitle: I want you to hold this up.
-[chuckles] -At which point, I will leave you alone
for as long as you need.
I know we'll never be soul mates, but we're friends.
Translation:
우린 절대 소울메이트는 못 되지만
그래도 친구잖아요

Subtitle: Now get in this boat and read some boring French poetry.
Translation:
이제 이 배에 타고
지루한 프랑스 시집이나 읽어요

Subtitle: I've never actually done this before.
Translation: 사실 이런 거 해 본 적 없어요

Subtitle: This is a theoretical fantasy.
How do you row a boat?
I'll tell ya, it's good as new. Go ahead, if you want, just... Here. [whoops]
See? You can jump up and down on it.
Hey, boss. So you fixed the sinkhole.
Yup, good as new. Crisis averted.
Everybody have a wonderful day, because I fixed the sinkhole.
Translation:
모두 멋진 하루 되세요
제가 싱크홀을 고쳤으니까요

Subtitle: -I didn't fix the sinkhole. -Sorry?
I tried and I tried, but nothing worked. And then all of a sudden...
Translation:
계속해 봤는데, 안 됐어요
그러다 갑자기...

Subtitle: This morning, out of the blue, it just... [exclaims]
It just closed over.
Huh... How 'bout that?
Well, as your assistant, I officially declare this good news.
Translation:
당신의 비서로서 공식적으로
이건 좋은 소식이라고 할게요

Subtitle: No, this is terrible news! I have no idea what caused it, Eleanor.
Translation:
아니요, 이건 끔찍한 소식이에요 대체 원인이 무엇인지
몰라요, 엘리너

Subtitle: And no idea what fixed it.
I want you to come to my office first thing in the morning.
You and I are gonna find this problem.
Translation:
당신과 내가
이 문제를 밝혀내야 해요

Subtitle: What are you doing?
Dude, I'm freaked out about my meeting with Michael,
and if I spend one more second staring at Creepo the Clown,
-I'm gonna lose it. -You named the clowns?
Translation:
- 미쳐버릴 것 같아요
- 광대한테 이름을 붙였어요?

Subtitle: Psycho, Creepo, Crazy Head, Stupid Juggling Weirdo,
Translation:
사이코, 소름이, 미친놈
저글링 하는 멍청이

Subtitle: Freaky Feet, and Nightmare George Washington.
Translation:
해괴한 발
그리고 악몽 조지 워싱턴이에요

Subtitle: One of them has to go.
Oh, sexy mailman. Much better.
In five minutes, Michael wants my help investigating
Translation:
5분 후에 마이클이
왜 마을 전체가 난리가 난 건지

Subtitle: what's making the neighborhood go nuts, which is obviously me.
Translation:
조사하게 도와달라고 할 거예요
물론 나 때문이겠죠

Subtitle: I mean, I did promise I would help. What do I do here?
Actually, the answer is...
Right here, in this easily understandable comic strip.
Nope, in this book about the theory of contractualism.
Translation:
아니요, 계약주의에 대한
책에 들어 있어요

Subtitle: What We Owe to Each Other. [gasps] I saw this movie.
Laura Linney cries in a lake house
because Jude Law left her for his ex-wife's ghost.
Translation:
주드 로가 전처의
귀신 때문에 떠났거든요

Subtitle: No. Quick summary of contractualism.
Uh, imagine a group of reasonable people
are coming up with the rules for a new society.
Translation:
새 사회의 규율을
만든다고 생각해 봐요

Subtitle: Like, "If your Uber driver talks to you, the ride should be free"?
Translation:
우버 운전사가 말을 걸면
요금이 공짜여야 한다는 것처럼?

Subtitle: Sure, but anyone can veto any rule that they think is unfair.
Translation:
그렇죠, 하지만 불공평하다고
생각하는 규율은 거부할 수 있어요

Subtitle: So, if you said, "We should be able to break our promises
Translation:
만약 당신이 '약속을 어겨도
아무 뒤탈이 없어야 해'라고 하면

Subtitle: without any repercussions," someone would veto that rule.
Well, my first rule would be that no one can veto my rules.
Translation:
내 첫 번째 규율은 '아무도
내 규율을 거부 못 함'일 거예요

Subtitle: Well, that's called "tyranny." And it's generally frowned upon.
Translation:
그건 폭정이에요
보통 아무도 안 좋아하죠

Subtitle: If you make a promise to someone, you should do it.
Translation:
누구에게 약속했다면
그 약속을 지켜야 해요

Subtitle: Just like I promised to help you and still am,
Translation:
내가 돕겠다고 약속했으니까
지금도 돕고 있는 것처럼

Subtitle: despite your constant mockery.
[mocking] "Despite your constant mockery." Whatever, you love it.
So, either I help him find the problem, which is me, and I'm doomed...
Translation:
문제를 찾게 도와주든가...
나라는 문제를 말이죠 그리고 난 망하겠죠
또, 도와주지 않으면

Subtitle: Or I don't help him,
Translation:
그리고 난 망하겠죠
또, 도와주지 않으면

Subtitle: and then I'm behaving unethically and the whole world goes crazy
Translation:
그리고 난 망하겠죠
또, 도와주지 않으면 비윤리적인 행동이고
세상은 엉망이 되어서

Subtitle: and I'm caught anyway.
I need to figure out a way to both help him and not help him at the same time.
Translation:
마이클을 도우면서 동시에
안 도울 방법을 찾아야 해요

Subtitle: -That's literally not possible. -Oh, really?
I once posed as a hot prom date for my cousin,
Translation:
옛날에 내 사촌 졸업 파티에
예쁜 파트너인 척해줘서

Subtitle: both helping him and later, according to his therapist,
not helping him.
Oh, hey, Eleanor. Thanks for coming in.
Sorry about the mess.
[clears throat] Oh, I forgot, you don't see in nine dimensions.
There's just a lot of... There's a lot of tension
in the air right now.
Are you okay, buddy? You seem kind of stressed.
Translation:
괜찮아요? - 스트레스 받는 것 같은데
- 아니에요, 괜찮아요

Subtitle: No, no, no, I'm fine. Top of my game, actually.
Translation:
- 스트레스 받는 것 같은데
- 아니에요, 괜찮아요 컨디션 최상이에요

Subtitle: Um, here, let me just...
Have a seat. There you go.
So, to prepare to meet all of you,
I studied the human concept of friends.
I even watched all ten seasons of the show Friends.
Boy, those Friends really were friends, weren't they?
Although, and I realize this is the kind of observation
that would only occur to the mind of an eternal being...
How did they afford that apartment?
A waitress and a chef with those Manhattan real estate prices.
Translation:
식당 종업원과 요리사가
맨해튼 집세를 감당해요?

Subtitle: Yeah, we were all confused about that too.
Anyway, it's been a tough couple of days.
Right now, I could really use a friend by my side.
Well, you know me, the person who has audibly promised to help you.
So, you need me to house-sit the whole week?
Translation: 한 주 내내 집을 봐 달라고요?

Subtitle: Sounds like somebody's gonna have a sweet vacay.
As I told you before, my mom is very sick.
I'm gonna help her move into assisted living.
Well, I'm here for you.
And your Wi-Fi is way better than my neighbor's, so I'm in.
Translation:
내 옆집보다 와이파이가
훨씬 나으니 집 봐줄게요

Subtitle: It's gonna mean taking care of Lester too.
Walk and feed him twice a day,
Translation:
하루에 두 번 밥 주고
산책시켜 주세요

Subtitle: -give him his kidney medicine. -Yup, got it. Feed his kidneys.
Translation:
- 신장 약도 주고요
- 알았어요, 신장 먹일게요

Subtitle: -Eleanor... -Yeah?
This is gonna be a very stressful week for me.
Translation:
이번 주는
나한테 아주 힘들 거예요

Subtitle: -I need to know that I can count on you. -I won't let you down.
Translation:
- 걱정하지 않게 해 주세요
- 실망하지 않게 할게요

Subtitle: I promise.
Jianyu, my love. How are you?
-I am decidedly so. -That's very profound.
Um, soulmate. An idea.
Our neighborhood now features a spa, and it offers couples packages.
Translation:
우리 동네에 생긴 스파에
커플 패키지가 있어요

Subtitle: And I thought maybe we could get facials, and do yoga, and talk
in long, discursive sentences.
Translation:
긴 대화체의 문장으로
얘기도 해 보지 않을래요?

Subtitle: What do you say?
-Signs point to yes. -Oh. [chuckles]
Marvelous! We'll go today.
Dude, you got to come with us to the spa.
No way. No, that's really weird.
You can't make small talk with her for one day without being caught?
Translation:
들키지 않고 하루 동안
잡담 좀 할 수 없어요?

Subtitle: No, I can't. She freaks me out.
She's so pretty, like Nala from The Lion King.
And she talks so smart, like Nala from The Lion King.
Translation:
'라이언 킹'에 나오는
날라처럼 말도 똑똑하게 해요

Subtitle: You gotta help me.
Well, if I feel sympathy for anyone, it's Tahani.
Translation:
내가 누구에게 동정을 느낀다면
타하니일 거예요

Subtitle: She's going through the same thing I am, but she doesn't know it.
Translation:
나랑 같은 일을 겪고 있는데
모를 뿐이니까요

Subtitle: Which means maybe I'm obligated to tell her.
Translation:
내가 타하니에게 얘기해줄
의무가 있단 뜻일 수도 있어요

Subtitle: Although, maybe it's better not to know.
Is ignorance bliss, or will the painful truth actually be healing...
Translation:
모르는 게 약인지 아니면
고통스러운 사실이 더 치유가...

Subtitle: You ready, Jianyu?
Oh, I cannot wait to just relax, and talk, and chat
Translation:
어서 편히 쉬면서
수다 떨고 싶어요

Subtitle: and just, you know...
Get to know each other.
Hey! Maybe I'll come too.
Oh, well, Chidi... It's just that this is, um...
This is really more of a couples thing.
I know.
But Eleanor's off with Michael, and Jianyu feels comfortable when I'm around.
Translation:
근데 엘리너는 마이클과 있고
지안유는 내가 있어야 편해해요

Subtitle: Right?
-Made in Taiwan. -Yes, you were.
You were made in Taiwan.
So... Couples date!
Let's go!
I never really looked around your office the first day.
Translation:
첫째 날에는
사무실을 자세히 안 봤어요

Subtitle: What is all this junk?
Well, technically, architects aren't allowed to own any human objects, but...
Translation:
사실 설계자는
인간의 물건을 소유하면 안 되지만...

Subtitle: Oh, I just love them so much.
And over here, look at this.
Aren't paper clips the most amazing things in the world?
Yeah. Sure.
Anyway, my current theory is that some object
Translation:
어쨌든, 현재 이론은
동네에 있는 물건들의

Subtitle: in the neighborhood is a design flaw which is causing everything to go haywire.
Translation: 디자인 결함 때문에 전부 난리가 났다는 거예요

Subtitle: So we need to find that object. We're gonna start with the rocks.
Translation:
그 물건을 찾아야 해요
일단 돌멩이부터 시작할 거예요

Subtitle: Now, I've investigated all of the rocks in the neighborhood.
Translation:
동네에 있는 모든 돌멩이를
조사해 봤어요

Subtitle: These 78 are the most suspicious.
I mean, maybe to an architect they might look suspicious,
but to me, they just look like rocks, so I'm not sure how I can help.
Translation:
저한테는 그냥 돌멩이 같아요
어떻게 도와야 할지 모르겠네요

Subtitle: Do any of them look defective?
Sinister? You know, like they're taunting you?
Translation:
사악해 보이는 건요?
조롱하는 것 같은 건요?

Subtitle: Always one step ahead?
You devious little monsters, you.
Okay, let's take a deep breath here, buddy.
You need to chill a little.
'Cause you have a very psycho, "burnout guy muttering to himself
Translation:
도서관 컴퓨터 앞에서
혼잣말을 중얼대는 지친 사람처럼

Subtitle: at a library computer" type vibe.
It's my responsibility to solve the problem.
Translation:
이 문제를 해결하는 건
내 책임이에요

Subtitle: What else can I do except keep working?
Translation:
계속 일하는 것 말고
내가 또 뭘 할 수 있겠어요?

Subtitle: You could stop working.
Look, I promised to help you, and honestly, the way I can help you
Translation:
내가 도와주겠다고 약속했죠
솔직히 내가 도와줄 수 있는 일은

Subtitle: is to force you to take a break.
And not working will help me work?
Translation:
일을 안 하는 게
일하는 걸 도울 수 있다고요?

Subtitle: Yes! Recharge the old batteries. I promise this is gonna help both of us.
Translation:
그럼요! 배터리를 충전해야죠 이게 우리 모두에게
도움이 될 거예요

Subtitle: Let's go.
Okay.
Let's keep our eyes peeled for twigs that may have a nefarious agenda.
Translation:
범죄를 계획하고 있는
나뭇가지가 있을 수 있으니 잘 감시하도록 하죠

Subtitle: -Okay, crazy, come on. -Yeah.
[Tahani] Hello, Janet.
Jianyu and I are here for the couples package, please.
[clears throat] And, also, I will be joining them.
Great, and who is the other half of your couple?
Oh, no, no, it's just me.
Couples are pairs of people.
Yup, and, uh, there is a pair of people, Tahani and Jianyu.
Translation:
네, 여기 커플이 있죠
타하니와 지안유요

Subtitle: And then also I am here.
Great, and who will be joining you?
No one.
Um, it's really quite simple, Janet.
They are a couple, and I am a third part of that couple,
Translation:
두 사람은 커플이고
저는 커플의 세 번째 사람이에요

Subtitle: a helper part who is here for fun and excitement.
Translation:
두 사람의 재미를
돕기 위해 온 사람요

Subtitle: It's a three-person couple.
[in robotic voice] Does not compute. Does not compute.
I'm just kidding. [laughs]
I mean, it doesn't compute, but I'm not gonna explode or anything.
Translation:
입력은 안 되지만
제가 폭발하진 않아요

Subtitle: Right. Well, I'll see you inside, darling.
Okay, you have to step up.
Find a way to connect with her without, you know, being you.
Translation:
당신처럼 굴지 않고
타하니와 친해질 방법을 찾아요

Subtitle: What does that even mean? Do I talk or not talk?
Translation:
그게 무슨 말이에요? 말을 하라고요?
아니면 하지 말라고요?

Subtitle: Do I be nice to Tahani, or do I throw all her jewelry in the toilet?
Translation:
잘해주라고요? 아니면 타하니의
보석을 전부 변기에 버려요?

Subtitle: That's the opposite of being nice?
So no toilet?
What is it with you and frozen yogurt?
Have you not heard of ice cream?
Oh, sure, but I've come to really like frozen yogurt.
Translation:
물론 알지만, 프로즌 요구르트를
좋아하게 됐어요

Subtitle: There's something so human about taking something great
Translation:
더 많이 먹으려고
정말 맛있는 것을 조금 망치는 게

Subtitle: and ruining it a little so you can have more of it.
Ha! That is very human.
Why do you need a human to be your assistant?
I mean, aren't there more of...
Whatever you are?
Well, since we're becoming friends,
like Ross and Phoebe...
Weird combo to pick, but okay.
I'm gonna tell you a secret.
Usually, architects don't live in their neighborhoods.
Translation:
보통 설계자들은
자기 동네에 살지 않아요

Subtitle: Usually, the people show up, we play the movie,
Janet is there to answer questions, and you're on your own.
Translation:
재닛이 질문에 대답하면
이제 알아서 해야 해요

Subtitle: But I had this theory. I thought transition would be easier
Translation:
하지만 이런 생각을 했죠
설계자가 현장에 있으면

Subtitle: if the architect were on-site
for at least the first 1,000 years or so.
That's why you've been so freaked out,
'cause your butt is on the line.
My boss thought I was nuts.
And if this neighborhood doesn't work, I am in big trouble.
Translation:
이 마을이 잘 안 되면
난 큰일 나요

Subtitle: But more importantly, I promised all of you
Translation:
하지만 더 중요한 건
여러분 모두에게

Subtitle: that you would be safe and happy.
And you just don't break a promise.
Unlike Ross, when he promised Emily not to talk to Rachel.
Translation:
로스가 레이철과 말하지 않겠다고
에밀리에게 약속했던 것과 달라요

Subtitle: Wow, you are really into that show.
You know something?
I feel better already. Should we get back to work?
Translation:
나 이미 기분이 나아졌어요
다시 일하러 갈까요?

Subtitle: [exclaiming] The whole point is to stop thinking about work and start having fun.
Translation:
일 생각은 그만하고
재미있게 놀려고 여기 나온 거예요

Subtitle: Now, what should we do first?
♪ I'm going out ♪
♪ In a blaze of glory ♪
♪ Lord, I never drew first ♪
♪ But I drew first blood ♪
♪ And I'm no one's son ♪
♪ So call me young gun... ♪
This is so interesting! I mean, there's no point to it.
The images on the screen relate to nothing.
Translation:
스크린에 뜨는 사진은
아무 연관도 없고요

Subtitle: Some time passed, and then it was over.
That's karaoke!
Oh, let's do it again.
Okay, my hands are heated to the ideal 105 degrees.
Who would like to go first?
Oh, well, what if I go first,
and then perhaps Jianyu could stand near me
and share some intimate aspects of his life?
Or what if...
While Janet messages Tahani, I massage Jianyu?
Translation:
재닛이 타하니를 마사지하는 동안
제가 지안유를 마사지하는 건요?

Subtitle: Jianyu, darling, let's discuss the arts.
I adore the impressionists.
Who's your favorite artist?
I mean, Pitbull changed the game--
Sorry, just working the oft-neglected mandible area.
Translation:
미안해요, 보통 많이 방치되는
아래턱뼈 마사지하는 거예요

Subtitle: Oh, man!
I didn't even want that thing. Why am I trying to win it?
Translation:
원하지도 않는데
왜 따려고 하는 거죠?

Subtitle: Because the machine says it's a prize.
[Michael] How many tickets do I get? Six?
Translation: 티켓 몇 개 받은 거죠? 여섯 개?

Subtitle: -Is that all? -Well, watch this.
-Is that allowed? -Not really.
But it is a time-honored tradition.
Say no more. I got it. I got it.
Translation:
더 말 안 해도 돼요
이해했어요

Subtitle: You know something?
As much as I've always wanted to be around humans,
I think I've missed a big part of what makes them wonderful.
Translation:
인간이 멋진 이유의
큰 부분을 몰랐던 것 같아요

Subtitle: Sometimes all you guys think about is how you can have the most fun.
Translation:
가끔 인간들은 어떻게 해야
재미있는지 밖에 생각을 안 해요

Subtitle: Exactly!
That was practically my mantra.
What's up, dong bait?
Ha-ha. Drop everything you're doing.
Rihanna is performing in Vegas. I got tickets. We are road-tripping.
Translation:
리한나의 라스베이거스 공연
티켓이 생겼어, 출발하자

Subtitle: Oh, I can't!
I promised I'd house-sit one more day, and I have to feed this stupid dog.
Translation:
집을 하루 더 봐 주기로 했어
멍청한 개밥 줘야 해

Subtitle: I'm sorry, does this dog smoke blunts topless
Translation:
미안한데, 이 개가
요트에서 멋있게 상의 벗고

Subtitle: on a yacht like a boss?
-'Cause that's how Ri-Ri do. -That's a very good point.
This is floor seats in Vegas for Rihanna.
The booze is free there. Do I really need to keep going?
Okay, this is dinner tonight, breakfast tomorrow...
Translation:
좋아, 이게 오늘 저녁이고
내일 아침밥이야

Subtitle: I have an idea.
This is in case of emergency.
Do not eat this unless it's an emergency.
Wow.
I'm ready to be a mom.
Translation: 나 이제 엄마가 될 준비가 됐나 봐

Subtitle: I'm having trouble getting this mask to stick.
Yes, it's 'cause my pores are just so small.
Translation: 네, 내 모공이 너무 작아서 그래요

Subtitle: There's no way anything could ever adhere to my skin.
It's a curse, really.
Jianyu, what are your pores like?
Janet, can you show me to the sauna, please?
Dude, she's trying so hard, and you're giving her nothing!
Translation:
타하니가 저렇게 노력하는데
당신은 아무 반응도 없잖아요!

Subtitle: Just pick a fact that you know about her and just muddle through.
Translation:
타하니에 대해 아는 거로
어떻게든 얘기해 봐요

Subtitle: She said she likes impressionist paintings.
Impressionist paintings? Okay, say no more.
No, no, no, I definitely feel like I need to say more.
Jianyu...
-[chuckling] -So would you say I helped you today?
Translation:
내가 오늘 마이클을
도운 것 같아요?

Subtitle: Oh, so much.
I had fun, I didn't think about my problems,
Translation:
재미있게 놀았고
문제에 대해 생각도 안 했고

Subtitle: and I won this ugly yellow toddler,
which is one of the most beautiful things I've ever seen.
Thank you so much.
All right, I'll see you tomorrow, friend.
You sure this is where you want to be right now?
Translation:
지금 있고 싶은 곳이
정말 여기예요?

Subtitle: At the Tea for Two couples cafe?
There's no use avoiding it, Chidi.
I'm alone.
Jianyu and I have nothing in common.
I just want a soulmate.
Someone I can share my passions with,
Translation: 내 열정을 나눌 수 있는 사람요

Subtitle: someone who I can talk to about the ethereal colors of a Degas.
Translation:
에드가르 드가 그림에 대해
얘기할 수 있는 사람요

Subtitle: I love Degas.
I took painting lessons as a kid, and Degas was always my inspiration.
Translation:
어릴 적 미술 수업을 들었는데
드가는 항상 내 영감이었어요

Subtitle: And do you like France as much as I do?
Well, they enslaved my country for 300 years. So, no.
Translation:
프랑스가 내 나라를
300년 동안 지배했어요 그래서 안 좋아해요

Subtitle: -But they have great museums. -Yes.
Welcome to my cafe, you two.
We have a special on soulmate muffins. Two for the price of zero.
Translation:
소울메이트 머핀 스페셜이 있어요
공짜로 두 개 드려요

Subtitle: Everything is free.
Oh, well, we're not soulmates.
-No. [laughs] -We're just...
-Soul friends. -[waitress] Oh.
[Eleanor] Hey, buddy.
I have all new fun stuff for us to do today.
Eleanor, I have huge news.
Not working actually worked.
It did what now?
After our day off, with a completely clear head,
I realized part of what makes humans so fun is that they're unpredictable.
Translation:
인간은 예측 불가능해서
정말 재미있다는 걸 깨달았어요

Subtitle: The chaos we've been experiencing
is exactly what would happen if a resident
Translation:
거주인이 예측 불가능한
행동을 했을 때

Subtitle: behaved unpredictably.
The problem in our neighborhood,
it's not a rock or an object.
It's one of the people.
Oh! We need to celebrate.
I know, okay... [exclaims]
Paper clip shower!
So do you think we're looking for a man,
or do you think we're looking for two men?
Not sure.
We don't know anything about this person.
Translation:
이 사람에 대해
아는 게 없어요

Subtitle: I mean, does he or she even know that they caused all these problems?
Translation:
여자든 남자든 이 사람이
문제라는 걸 본인은 알까요?

Subtitle: No, that can't be.
I mean, what kind of monster would wreak havoc and then say nothing?
Translation:
어떤 괴물이 동네에 피해를 주고
아무 말도 안 하겠어요?

Subtitle: So this is the main place where the garbage fell from the sky.
-Janet. -Hi there.
I need a list of everyone that was here on garbage duty
Translation:
오리엔테이션 중에
여기 있었던 쓰레기 담당의

Subtitle: during orientation.
Eleanor, our criminal is on this very short list.
People were flying that day too. I'll add everybody who flew overhead.
Translation:
그날 비행 중이던 사람도 있어요
당시 하늘에 있던 사람도 넣을게요

Subtitle: Eleanor, our criminal is on this much longer list.
Oh, hey, homey. Thanks for your advice.
I'm about to give Tahani the best gift ever.
Check it.
What?
She likes impressionist paintings, right?
I got her a painting of the best impressionist of all time,
Frank Caliendo.
He can do it all. Fat Al Pacino, fat Jerry Seinfeld,
Translation:
다 할 수 있어요
뚱뚱한 알 파치노, 제리 사인필드

Subtitle: regular John Madden.
Translation: 정상 존 매든도 따라 할 수 있어요

Subtitle: "Say hello to my little friend.
Forget about it."
This is where the sinkhole opened up.
And the guest list that night was limited.
There were a total of 30 people here that night.
-[exclaiming in delight] -Only 30, huh?
Yeah! How do you pump your fist again?
Is this it?
But, 66 others passed through to take a look before it opened,
and everyone else in the neighborhood was in a close radius.
Oh, boy, that... Doesn't narrow it down at all.
Feels like the end of the road.
End of the Road, Boyz II Men, karaoke.
Translation:
보이즈투맨의 '엔드 오브 더 로드'
노래방 어때요?

Subtitle: Let's go. Don't think about it too much.
Janet.
My hoodie, please.
-What's happening? -I give up.
I can't help the people I promised that I would help.
Translation:
내가 도와주겠다고 약속한
사람들을 도울 수가 없어요

Subtitle: I feel like Friends in Season 8,
out of ideas and forcing Joey and Rachel together,
Translation:
아이디어가 없으니
아무리 말이 안 돼도

Subtitle: even though it made no sense.
I hope the sinkhole opens up again and swallows me whole.
Translation:
싱크홀이 다시 열려서
날 통째로 집어삼켰으면 좋겠어요
